titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in Parliament assembled. Reasons humbly offer'd by Captain George St. Lo, for bringing down the exorbitant rates of seamens wages from 50 s. and 3 l. a month, to 30 s. and 35 s. a month.
titleStmt.author: St. Lo, George, d. 1718.

notesStmt.note: Publication information from the British Library.
